text: Foolish Thing Desire is the second solo album from former Bauhaus, Tones on Tail, and Love and Rockets guitar player Daniel Ash. == Track listing == # Here She Comes # Foolish Thing Desire # Bluebird # Dream Machine # Get Out of Control # The Void # Roll On # Here She Comes Again # The Hedonist # Higher Than This # Paris '92 (exclusive to Japanese Version) # Acid Rain (exclusive to Japanese Version) # Firedance (exclusive to Japanese Version) ==References== Category:1992 albums Category:Daniel Ash albums Category:Beggars Banquet Records albums
title: Foolish Thing Desire
